name: Flatulent World
description:
In this game, the hero Kaki has to clear all 4 stages farting his way through. 

  • Use green beans to jump higher (farter)
  • Use red beans to kill with a fart.
  • Push some enemies from the platform to smash them.
  • Defeat the final boss.

Once the stage is clear, the door will be opened and you'll be ready for the next.
